name: Bit wars (Ref_used)
description:
80s vs modern. in a battle between technology who will win? The joystick weilding atariesq Bit or the hightech Cid. The game revolves around the diffrence in input and functions between the past and today. One player uses a usb joystick while the other one uses a 360 controller. Each with their own powers and abilitys.

Team:
Rasmus Jarl - Programmer
Joseph Crowe - Programmer
Magnus Nilsson - Artist
